sentences.sContent: He stepped out on to the narrow ledge and, holding the frame, stretched across to wipe away the annoying smudge.
sentences.sContent_eng: He stepped out on to the narrow ledge and, holding the frame, stretched across to wipe away the annoying smudge.
sentences.sCn: 他走出狭窄的窗台上，抓着窗框，探身出去擦去那烦人的污迹。

sentences.sContent: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
sentences.sContent_eng: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
sentences.sCn: 神要擦去他们一切的眼泪。 不再有死亡，也不再有悲哀，哭号，疼痛，因为以前的事都过去了。

sentences.sContent: doesn't wipe away a lipstick smudge in the presence of the woman who planted it on him.
sentences.sContent_eng: doesn't wipe away a lipstick smudge in the presence of the woman who planted it on him.
sentences.sCn: 不会当着女人的面擦掉她留在他脸上的唇印，而是把它当成一种荣幸而留着它，即使时间很短。
